sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Fragment } from "react"; import { ListGroup, Image, Row, Col, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; import Message from "../components/Message"; const PlaceOrder = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart); //CALCULATE PRICES cart.itemPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce( (acc, cur) => acc + cur.price * cur.qty, 0 ); cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemPrice > 100 ? 0 : 100; cart.taxPrice = Number((cart.itemPrice * 0.15).toFixed(2)); const placeOrderHandler = () => {}; return (

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address} {cart.shippingAddress.city}{" "} {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode} {cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((i, index) => ( {i.name} {i.qty} X {i.price}= ${i.qty * i.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemPrice} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ); }; export default PlaceOrder;
